text: Vladimir Polyakov (Russian: Владимир Евгеньевич Поляков; born 9 July 1952) is a Soviet rower. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich with the men's coxless pair where they came eighths. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Vladimir Polyakov (rower)
